item.description:
VERY advanced notice for our 6th session of the Couch to 5K training program!

If you don't think you can run, THINK AGAIN! If I could do this, then anyone can follow this program at their own pace to run, jog or "wog" a 5K. :) We have so many graduates already and I'd love to see more. Please invite your friends to join us! Having a group to train with is part of the success.

For those of you who missed in passed sessions, we will meet twice a week at the track to train for 5K events. We had walkers join us and cheer us on and more experienced runners who gave us inspiration. After months of meeting at the track, I met some great people and made some wonderful friendships. The support and encouragement of doing this with a group is so amazing! Time at the track became something I looked forward to and really miss.

If you are looking get in some time to walk, want to train with us, or are runner of your own, please join us every and any Monday and Wednesday night at BHS.  To get everyone ready for a 5K, event we will be posting training events using the "Couch to 5K" training schedule. When more options are available, I will find some 5K events to post on the calendar for our "final exam".

(we will be meeting twice a week for those who are training, so you SHOULD train the 3rd time on your own either on Friday or Saturday to keep with the schedule)

http://www.coolrunning.com/engine/2/2_3/181.shtml

Week 1 we are starting from scratch. Remember to bring your sneakers and some water!Couch to 5K, Week 1 Plan:
(train 3x during the week)

Brisk five-minute warm up walk.
Then alternate 60 seconds of jogging and 90 seconds of walking for a total of 20 minutes. (8 times)
Don't worry, I'll bring the stop watch with the whistle so everyone knows when to start and stop the jogging.

Monday, April 23rd
6:30pm
Braintree High School
Track
Meet at the entrance by the bleachers

Organizer: Julie
MAX: 45

Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by NOON on Monday, April 23rd

Inclement Weather: Heavy rains will cancel. We will train if it is overcast or there is a slight drizzle. Please plan to bring a lightweight jacket with a hood just in case. (We will do
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the entrance by the bleachers

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Couch to 5K Training BEGINS! Walkers & Joggers Welcome
